Description:
See how a developer in Zambia is using MapYourGrid's open data and GitHub Copilot to create powerful maps that visualize energy access gaps. This is tech-for-good in action, showing how a simple prompt in VS Code or a GitHub issue can accelerate sustainable development and help power a brighter future.
